tsb-reminder-title-generic: Compleate yer introduction tae become aen owerseter
tsb-reminder-content-generic:
Hallo $1,

Thanks fer registerin wi {{SITENAME}}.

Gif ye compleate yer test owersets, the admeenistraters will graunt ye ful owerseter access soon efterwairds.

Please come ower n dae some mair owersets here:
$2

$3,
{{SITENAME}} staff
tsb-email-promoted-body:
Hallo {{GENDER:$1|$1}},

Weel duin! A'v checkit ower the test owersettins that ye did at {{SITENAME}} an gien ye fu owersetter richts.

Heid til {{SITENAME}} tae continue owersettin nou, an ivery day:
$2

Walcome, an thank ye fur yer contreibutions!

{{GENDER:$3|$3}},
{{SITENAME}} staff
tsb-email-rejected-subject: Yer appleecation tae be aen owerseter at {{SITENAME}} wis turned doon
tsb-email-rejected-body:
Hello {{GENDER:$1|$1}},

Thank ye fur applyin as ae owersetter at {{SITENAME}}. A regret tae tell ye that a hae turnt doun yer application, acause the quality o yer owersettins didna meet the requirements.

Gin ye hink that yer application wis turnt doun bi mistak, please try tae apply again as ae owersetter at {{SITENAME}}. Ye can sign up here:
$2

{{GENDER:$3|$3}},
{{SITENAME}} staff
tsb-didnt-make-any-translations: This uiser didna dae onie owersets.
tsb-delete-userpage-summary: Delytin the uiser page o ae saunpit uiser
translate-translationstash-welcome-note: Become familiair wi the owersetin tuils. Owerset some messages n get ful-owerseter richts tae pairteecipate in yer favorite waurks.
tsb-limit-reached-body:
Ye'v reached the owersetin leemit fer new owerseters.
Oor team will verefie n upgrade yer accoont suin.
Than ye'll be able tae owerset wioot leemits.
log-description-translatorsandbox: Ae log o actions oan owersetin saunpit uisers
logentry-translatorsandbox-rejected: $1 {{GENDER:$2|turned doon}} the request fae "$3" tae become aen owerseter
logentry-newusers-tsbpromoted: Uiser accoont $3 wis {{GENDER:$2|made}} bi promuivin fae saundpit
